English: Informs all party members of the party leader's location.
Finnish: Ilmoittaa ryhmän johtajalle ryhmän jäsenien sijainnit.

English: The party leader orders party members to attack a target.
Finnish: Ryhmän johtaja määrää ryhmän jäsenet hyökkäämään kohdetta vastaan.

English: The party leader orders all party members to retreat.
Finnish: Ryhmän johtaja määrää ryhmän jäsenet perääntymään.

English: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.
Finnish: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.

English: Each party member around the leader increases the party leader's damage by 5%.
Finnish: Each party member around the leader increases the party leader's damage by 5%.

English: Increases the chance for Masquerpets to drop unique items.
Finnish: Kasvattaa mahdollsuuksia uniikkien esineiden putoamiselle Masquerpetseiltä.

English: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist, party members recover 1.8 times faster.
Finnish: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist, party members recover 1.8 times faster.

English: Increases the number of items dropped by Masquerpets.
Finnish: Kasvattaa mahdollisuuksia useamman esineen putoamiseen Masquerpetseiltä.

English: Each party member gains a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member nearby. This does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
Finnish: Each party member gains a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member nearby. This does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
